content.rendered:
Directed by Ranjit Tewari

Written by Aseem Arrora. Parveez Sheikh. Vashu Bhagnani

Cast Akshay Kumar(Anshul Malhotra). Huma Qureshi(Adeela Rehman). Vaani Kapoor(Radhika Malhotra). Lara Dutta(Indira Gandhi). Zain Khan Durrani(Doddy). Adil Hussain(Santook). Kavi Raz(Mohammad Zia Ul-Haq). Denzil Smith(Kao). Kal Sabir(Amrik Singh). Adi Chugh(Sulehi). Qais Khan(Kazini). Sammy Jonas Heaney(Marcus). Dolly Ahluwalia(Raavie Malhotra). Sumeet Kaul(Dollar (as Sumit Kaul)).Mamik Singh. Thalaivasal Vijay(Rao). Ajay Chhabra(Venketraman). Husam Chadat(Farhad Bin Sultan). Erin Geraghty(Zelda Wagner). Diljohn Singh(Shunty). Amit Kumar Vashisth(Saand).Chobber Sidhu. Jitendra Rai(Translator Punjab). Sunit Tandon(ISI Chief). Taz Singh(Sardar). Moumita Moitra(Anita). Neelam Bakshi(Passanger Lady). Girish Sharma(Anshul’s Friend). Nakul Bhalla(Monty). Aniruddh Dave(Puchchi). Farhan Baqi(Ajitpal). Abhijeet Lahiri(Khan (as Abhijit Lahiri)).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Deesh Mariwala(Tejaswar). Resh Lamba(Sandhu). Ellie Flory Fawcett(Female Weather Reporter (UK)).Sanat Sawant. Sabrina John(Airport Visitor). Monisha Hassen(PMO Secretary). Fahad Salman(Al-Ameen Senior Police Officer). Kent Goldfinch(BBC Journalist).Siby Varghese. Ashok Chhabra(Morarji Desai). Shivani Sopori(Raavie’s friend (as Shivaani Sopuri)). Anjali Anand(Anjali – Ashu’s wife). Kunal Singh(Satya (Dev’s friend) (as Kunal Singh Kushwaha)). Jatin Negi(Sunder). Bhavini Sheth(Neetika Sharma). Pranay Ranjan(Police Man).

Languages Hindi

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Jackky Bhagnani. Vashu Bhagnani. Madhu Bhojwani. Gaurav Bose. Deepshika Deshmukh. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Sahil Gandotra. Mudit Jain. Radhika Joshi. Somair Malhotra. Sarwar Mohammad. Max Rahman. Mahipal Karan Rathore. Navmeet Singh

Production Emmay Entertainment.. Pooja Entertainment & Films. Pooja Films
